about_the_game:
************ STREETS DISCIPLE v2.0************


Street's Disciple Version 2.0 Edition is a full on street fighter for a single player and multiplayer 3 on 3 versus CPU or controlled characters.

You play as one of the 16 street disciple apostles to beat the evil master Super Hansoon and you can fight and punch and kick and show that you're top disciple and can lead to the top and be master of the Streets Disciple's.


Development questions and comments can be found on our Discord

Street's Disciple UPDATE version 2.0 Now here Version 1.0 discontinued.



Streets disciples discord link


Frog Invasion Games Discord Link


COMPANY:
EMAIL: froginvasiongames@gmail.com

VIMEO:

Presenting Street's Disciple v2.0
---THREE Count em' 3 versions of the game are available---
1. ACTAUL GAME - Version 2.0
2. DEMO VERSION - Original Version. Version 1.0
3. PLAYTEST - 2D Stylized Anime Fighter
_________

1. ACTAUL GAME - Version 2.0 - This is a template project of a fighting game that can be completely played. Add your favorite stages and characters to create your own fighting game.

■Select Fighting mode:
2.5D 1on1
2.5D 3on3(Assist)
2.5D 3on3(Non-Assist)
3D 1on1

OPTION
■Select mode:
Arcade Mode, VS CPU, VS Player and Training Mode can be selected.
■Select stage:
Two stage is prepared.
■Select character:
Mannequin is available as samples.
■Play battle:
Introduction with sequencer

You win with 2 rounds of 99(1on1)/300(3on3) seconds per round.
you can pause play, resume, Back to the title, retry.
Round result is KO, DoubleKO, Timeover, Ring-out, and Draw.
■Character movement :
Collision control with capsule component


2. DEMO VERSION - Original Version. Version 1.0 -Platform Fighter. A battle platform fighter for a single player versus 3 computer controlled characters. You play as a street disciple ninja and the ninjas are at war with each other. 2 - 4 players

3. PLAYTEST - 2D Stylized color cartoon version. - Anime Fighter: Features:
5 characters examples, super attack with custom background example.
Input Buffer
Human and AI control
Cinematic action
Hitbox
Some effect (stop time, ghost trail, mesh color, etc.)
Stylized menus and characters example
Arcade, Versus, Training mode (Coop quest beta mode)


Character Lineup:

01 Ryuha
02 Ruya
03 Predator
04 Kon
05 Kate
06 Beth
07 Ninja
08 Rick
09 Slinter
10 Razr
11 Iotu
12Scars
13 Bodygaurd
14 Sumo
15 Hansoon
16 Super Hansoon

You play as one of the 16 street disciple apostles to beat the evil master Super Hansoon and you can fight and punch and kick and show that you're top disciple and can lead to the top and be master of the Streets Disciple's.

name: Street's Disciple

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4095MB NVIDIA GeForce
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: Generic Gamepad Developer's Recommended Configuration
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4820K @ 3.70GHz
  • Memory: 32.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4095MB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: Generic Gamepad Developer's Recommended Configuration
